GR13purekaku:0: akāro vāsudevaḥ syād ākāraś ca pitāmahaḥ /
GR13purekaku:1: pūjāyām api māṅgalye ākāraḥ parikīrttitaḥ // PEk_1
GR13purekaku:2: ikāro ucyate kāmo lakṣmī rīkāra ucyate /
GR13purekaku:3: ukāraḥ śaṅkaraḥ prokta ūkāraś cāpi rakṣaṇe // PEk_2
GR13purekaku:5: ḷkāro devayoniḥ syāl ḹr mātā sadbhir ucyate // PEk_3
GR13purekaku:6: ekāraḥ kathito viṣṇur aikāraś ca maheśvaraḥ /
GR13purekaku:7: okāras tu bhaved brahmā aukāro rudra ucyate // PEk_4
GR13purekaku:8: aṃ syāc ca paramaṃ brahma aḥ syād devo maheśvaraḥ /
GR13purekaku:9: kaḥ prajāpatir uddiṣṭo ko vāyur iti śabditaḥ // PEk_5
GR13purekaku:10: kaś cātmā ca samākhyātaḥ kaḥ prakāśa udāhṛtaḥ /
GR13purekaku:11: kaṃ śiro jalam ākhyātaṃ kaṃ sukhaṃ ca prakīrtitam // PEk_6
GR13purekaku:12: pṛthivyāṃ kuḥ samākhyātā kutsāyāṃ kuḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GR13purekaku:13: kham indriyaṃ samākhyātaṃ kham ākāśam udāhṛtam // PEk_7
GR13purekaku:14: khaṃ svarge ca samākhyātaṃ khaṃ sarpe ca prakīrtitaṃ /
GR13purekaku:15: tathā śvabhre ca khaṃ prāhuḥ khaṃ śūnye ca prakīrttitam // PEk_8
GR13purekaku:16: go gaṇapatir uddiṣṭo go gandharvaḥ prakīrttitaḥ /
GR13purekaku:17: gaṃ gītaṃ gā ca gāthā syād gaur dhenur gauḥ sarasvatī // PEk_9
GR13purekaku:18: gaur mātāpi samuddiṣṭā pṛthivyāṃ gauḥ prakīrttitā /
GR13purekaku:19: gho ghaṇṭāyāṃ samākhyātaḥ kiṅkiṇī ghā prakīrttitā // PEk_10
GR13purekaku:20: upamā ghā samākhyātā kusvare ghuḥ prakīrttitaḥ /
GR13purekaku:21: hanane ghā samākhyātā gandhane ghaḥ prakīrttitaḥ // PEk_11
GR13purekaku:22: ṅakāro bhairavaḥ khyāto ṅakāro viṣaye smṛtaḥ /
GR13purekaku:23: cakāraś candramāḥ khyātas taskaraś ca prakīrttitaḥ // PEk_12
GR13purekaku:24: nirmalaṃ chaṃ samākhyātaṃ taraṇī chaḥ prakīrttitaḥ /
GR13purekaku:25: chedane chaḥ samākhyāto vidvadbhiḥ śabdakovidaiḥ // PEk_13
GR13purekaku:26: vegite jaḥ samākhyāto jaghane jaḥ prakīrttitaḥ /
GR13purekaku:27: jetā ca jaḥ samākhyātaḥ prasiddhaiḥ śabdakovidaiḥ // PEk_14
GR13purekaku:28: jhaṃjhāvāte jhakāraḥ syān naṣṭe jhaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ /
GR13purekaku:29: ñakāro gāyane prokto ñakāro ghargharadhvanau // PEk_15
GR13purekaku:30: ṭaṅkāre ṭaḥ pṛthivyāṃ ṭā ṭo dhvanau ca prakīrtitaḥ /
GR13purekaku:31: ṭho maheśvara ākhyātaḥ śūnye ca ṭhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // PEk_16
GR13purekaku:32: bṛhaddhvanau ca ṭhaḥ proktas tathā candrasya maṇḍale /
GR13purekaku:33: ḍakāraḥ śaṅkaraḥ proktas trāsadhvanyoḥ prakīrtitaḥ // PEk_17
GR13purekaku:34: ḍhakāraḥ kīrtitā ḍhakkā nirguṇe ca dhvanāv api /
GR13purekaku:35: ṇakāraḥ kīrtito jñāne nirṇaye 'pi prakīrtitaḥ // PEk_18
GR13purekaku:36: takāraḥ kathitaś cauraḥ kroḍe pucche prakīrtitaḥ /
GR13purekaku:37: śiloccaye thakāraḥ syāt thakāro bhayarakṣaṇe // PEk_19
GR13purekaku:39: dhaṃ dhane ca dhaneśe dho dhā dhātari nidarśitaḥ // PEk_20
GR13purekaku:40: dhiṣaṇā dhīḥ samākhyātā dhūś ca syād bhāracintayoḥ /
GR13purekaku:41: nakāraḥ sugate bandhe nuḥ stutau ca prakīrtitaḥ // PEk_21
GR13purekaku:42: netā nīś ca samākhyātas taraṇau nauḥ prakīrtitā /
GR13purekaku:43: nakāraḥ saugate buddhau stuto sūrye ca kīrtitaḥ // PEk_22
GR13purekaku:44: naśabdaḥ svāgate bandhau vṛkṣe sūrye ca kīrtitaḥ /
GR13purekaku:45: paḥ kuberaḥ samākhyātaḥ paścime ca prakīrtitaḥ // PEk_23
GR13purekaku:46: pavane paḥ samākhyātaḥ pāḥ pāne pāś ca pātari /
GR13purekaku:47: kaphe vāte phakāraḥ syāt tathāhvāne prakīrtitaḥ // PEk_24
GR13purekaku:48: jhaṃjhāvāte phakāraḥ syād akṣare ca prakīrtitaḥ /
GR13purekaku:49: kope phiś ca samākhyātas tathā niṣphalabhāṣaṇe // PEk_25
GR13purekaku:50: vakṣaḥsthale ca baḥ prokto gadāyāṃ samudāhṛtaḥ /
GR13purekaku:51: nakṣatraṃ bhaṃ budhaiḥ proktaṃ bhramare bhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // PEk_26
GR13purekaku:52: bhā dīptir api bhūr bhūmir bhīr bhayaṃ kathitā budhaiḥ /
GR13purekaku:53: maḥ śivaś candramā vedhā mā ca lakṣmīḥ prakīrtitā // PEk_27
